name: Farmageddon (itch)
description:
Be the last cannon standing in this turn-based planetary vegetable combat in the vein of classics like Worms or Scorched Earth, but with a 3D, fully destructible planet. Supports 1-4 players with local multiplayer or terrible, terrible AI.

This was my entry for LudumDare 38 "Small World". Thanks for playing it, and all feedback is appreciated!
